caseStudies.title: AI-Driven Inventory Planning Revolution
caseStudies.subtitle: Transforming Retail Planning with Custom ML Pipelines
caseStudies.heroDescription: Built custom ML forecasting system that eliminated spreadsheet-based planning for Fortune 500 retailers

challenge.title: Retailers Drowning in Spreadsheet Complexity
challenge.description: Fortune 500 retail clients were using massive, error-prone spreadsheets for inventory planning, leading to poor demand forecasting, excessive discounting, and planner burnout. The manual process consumed planners' time with data manipulation instead of strategic decision-making.
keyProblems: Manual spreadsheet processes taking 80% of planners' time
Historical demand patterns poorly captured in static models
Long lifecycle pricing curves leading to deep discount spirals
No integration between planning tools and real-time market data

approach.title: Custom ML Pipeline Architecture
approach.description: I spearheaded the development of retailer-specific machine learning pipelines that combined forecasting methodologies with LLM-powered insights to revolutionize the planning process.
methodology: Customer Discovery: Conducted deep-dive sessions with retail planners to understand workflow pain points
Technical Architecture: Designed custom ML pipelines tailored to each retailer's unique data patterns
LLM Integration: Implemented language models to help planners interpret complex demand signals
YAML ETL Pipeline: Built automated data integration saving $4M in client onboarding costs

solution.title: Intelligent Planning Platform
solution.description: Delivered an AI-driven inventory planning system that automated data processing, provided intelligent forecasting, and gave planners actionable insights through natural language interfaces.
keyFeatures: Custom ML forecasting models adapted to each retailer's historical patterns
LLM-powered demand signal interpretation and recommendations
Automated YAML ETL pipeline for seamless data integration
Real-time collaboration tools replacing static spreadsheets
Predictive pricing optimization to reduce deep discount scenarios

primaryMetrics.description: Improvement in planning accuracy for Fortune 500 retail clients
Saved in client onboarding costs through automated ETL pipeline
Reduction in manual data manipulation time for planners

results.businessImpact: Transformed how Fortune 500 retailers approach inventory planning, moving from reactive spreadsheet management to proactive AI-driven strategy. Planners could focus on strategic decisions rather than data wrangling.
results.customerFeedback: Planners reported significantly improved job satisfaction and ability to make data-driven decisions with confidence.

learnings: Custom ML solutions require deep industry expertise to be effective
LLM integration can bridge the gap between complex data and human decision-making
Automated data pipelines are crucial for enterprise AI adoption
Success metrics must align with both technical performance and user workflow improvement

caseStudies.title: AI-Powered Moving Industry Transformation
caseStudies.subtitle: Intelligent Automation Delivering $2M+ Revenue Growth
caseStudies.heroDescription: Led AI-enhanced B2B platform transformation with intelligent automation and predictive analytics

challenge.title: Manual Processes Limiting Growth Potential
challenge.description: Moving companies were struggling with time-consuming quote generation, inaccurate cost predictions, and fragmented payment processes that hindered customer experience and business growth.
keyProblems: Quote generation taking excessive time, reducing sales conversion
Inaccurate move cost predictions leading to customer disputes
Fragmented payment processing limiting cash flow
Lack of intelligent lead filtering causing sales inefficiency

approach.title: AI-First Product Strategy
approach.description: I implemented an AI-enhanced approach focusing on intelligent automation, predictive analytics, and seamless financial integration to transform the moving industry experience.
methodology: Customer Research: Conducted 20+ monthly interviews to identify automation opportunities
AI Implementation: Integrated smart lead filtering and predictive cost modeling
Payment Innovation: Delivered ACH payment system achieving first-time certification
Ecosystem Development: Launched OpenAPI platform for third-party integrations

solution.title: Intelligent Moving Platform
solution.description: Built comprehensive AI-enhanced platform combining intelligent automation, predictive analytics, and integrated financial services to revolutionize moving company operations.
keyFeatures: AI-powered lead filtering system for sales optimization
Machine learning-based move cost prediction algorithms
Automated ACH payment processing (first-time certification)
OpenAPI ecosystem enabling third-party integrations
Intelligent workflow automation reducing manual processes

primaryMetrics.description: Revenue from ACH payments product (fastest company launch in 8 months)
ARR generated from OpenAPI platform launch
Reduction in quote generation time through AI automation
Improvement in move cost prediction accuracy using ML
Increase in customer satisfaction through intelligent automation

results.businessImpact: Transformed moving companies from manual, error-prone processes to AI-driven, efficient operations. The platform became a competitive differentiator in the fragmented moving industry.
results.customerFeedback: Moving companies reported significant time savings and improved customer relationships due to more accurate predictions and streamlined processes.

learnings: AI integration must solve real workflow problems, not just add technology
Financial product development requires meticulous compliance and testing
API ecosystems can create significant revenue opportunities in B2B markets
Customer feedback loops are essential for AI model improvement

caseStudies.title: Enterprise Transportation Platform at Scale
caseStudies.subtitle: Managing 5,000+ Daily Student Routes with AI Optimization
caseStudies.heroDescription: Built comprehensive multi-platform TMS with geo-spatial AI routing for special needs transportation

challenge.title: Complex Special Needs Transportation at Scale
challenge.description: Managing 5,000+ daily special needs student transportation routes required coordinating 40+ contractor teams while ensuring safety, compliance, and operational efficiency across multiple platforms.
keyProblems: Dispatch process required 5 separate tools and $300 manual labor per route
No integrated solution for special needs transportation requirements
Complex coordination needed across 40+ contractor teams
Lack of real-time visibility into route optimization and safety protocols

approach.title: Multi-Platform AI-Enhanced Architecture
approach.description: I led the development of a comprehensive transportation ecosystem combining geo-spatial AI routing, real-time tracking, and integrated dispatch management across multiple platforms.
methodology: Platform Strategy: Designed 2 web apps and 2 mobile apps for complete ecosystem coverage
AI Integration: Implemented geo-spatial routing algorithms for optimization
Team Coordination: Managed 40+ contractor teams through systematic project management
Compliance Focus: Ensured all solutions met special needs transportation regulations

solution.title: Comprehensive Transportation Management System
solution.description: Delivered integrated TMS platform combining AI-driven route optimization, real-time tracking, and streamlined dispatch operations specifically designed for special needs transportation.
keyFeatures: Geo-spatial AI routing algorithms for optimal route planning
Real-time tracking and safety monitoring for special needs students
Unified dispatch workflow replacing 5 separate tools
Multi-platform ecosystem (2 web apps, 2 mobile apps)
Contractor coordination and management system

primaryMetrics.description: Projected revenue from comprehensive platform launch
Daily student routes managed through AI-optimized system
Operational efficiency improvement in dispatch processes
Manual labor cost eliminated per route through automation

results.businessImpact: Revolutionized special needs transportation operations by creating the first integrated platform specifically designed for this complex market segment.
results.customerFeedback: Dispatchers reported dramatic improvement in efficiency and ability to ensure student safety through real-time monitoring capabilities.

learnings: Special needs transportation requires unique compliance and safety considerations
AI routing algorithms must account for more than just distance optimization
Multi-platform ecosystems require careful UX consistency planning
Large contractor team coordination demands systematic project management

caseStudies.title: National District Scaling Through Process Innovation
caseStudies.subtitle: Scaling Operations to 1000+ School Districts
caseStudies.heroDescription: Built scalable dispatch platform serving 1000+ school districts with operational excellence framework

challenge.title: Scaling Startup to Enterprise Operations
challenge.description: Transforming a startup transportation platform to serve 1000+ school districts while maintaining service quality and operational efficiency.
keyProblems: Manual processes couldn't scale beyond small district count
Inconsistent service delivery across different district sizes
Complex operational workflows creating customer friction
Need for systematic approach to nationwide expansion

approach.title: Systematic Scaling Framework
approach.description: I developed comprehensive operational excellence frameworks and scalable technology solutions to enable nationwide district expansion while maintaining service quality.
methodology: Process Standardization: Created repeatable frameworks for district onboarding
Technology Scaling: Built central data layer supporting distributed operations
Quality Assurance: Implemented systematic monitoring and improvement processes
Customer Success: Conducted monthly stakeholder meetings for continuous feedback

solution.title: Scalable Transportation Ecosystem
solution.description: Delivered comprehensive platform architecture supporting nationwide operations with standardized processes, centralized data management, and distributed execution capabilities.
keyFeatures: Central data layer supporting distributed operations
Standardized dispatch workflows for consistent service delivery
Scalable operations webapp and mobile applications
Automated monitoring and performance optimization
Customer success framework with regular stakeholder engagement

primaryMetrics.description: School districts successfully onboarded and served
Reduction in operational complexity through process optimization

results.businessImpact: Successfully transformed startup into nationwide platform capable of serving enterprise-scale school district operations while maintaining high service quality.
results.customerFeedback: District administrators praised the consistent service delivery and responsive customer success approach across all regions.

learnings: Scaling requires balancing standardization with local customization needs
Customer success frameworks are crucial for enterprise expansion
Operational excellence must be built into the product, not added later
Regular stakeholder engagement drives continuous improvement

caseStudies.title: Aerospace FinTech Data Liberation
caseStudies.subtitle: Full-Stack SAP Integration Saving $800K Annually
caseStudies.heroDescription: Built custom full-stack application extracting SAP data for automated financial reporting

challenge.title: Manual Financial Reporting Bottleneck
challenge.description: Finance teams were spending hundreds of hours manually extracting and processing data from SAP systems for regulatory reporting, creating bottlenecks and error-prone processes.
keyProblems: Manual SAP data extraction consuming massive finance team hours
Error-prone manual processes affecting regulatory compliance
Lack of automated reporting capabilities
No integration between SAP and reporting systems

approach.title: Full-Stack Automation Solution
approach.description: I designed and built a custom full-stack application that automated SAP data extraction and created streamlined reporting workflows for finance teams.
methodology: Requirements Analysis: Worked with finance teams to understand reporting workflows
Technical Design: Architected full-stack solution for SAP integration
Development: Built custom application with automated data processing
Implementation: Deployed solution saving over $800K in annual man hours

solution.title: Automated SAP Reporting Platform
solution.description: Delivered comprehensive full-stack application that automated SAP data extraction, processing, and reporting, eliminating manual workflows and ensuring compliance.
keyFeatures: Automated SAP data extraction and processing
Custom reporting dashboard for finance teams
Regulatory compliance automation
Error reduction through automated validation
Streamlined workflow replacing manual processes

primaryMetrics.description: Annual savings in man hours through process automation
Automation of previously manual SAP reporting processes

results.businessImpact: Transformed finance team operations by eliminating time-consuming manual processes and ensuring consistent, accurate regulatory reporting.
results.customerFeedback: Finance teams reported significant time savings and improved confidence in regulatory reporting accuracy.

learnings: Legacy system integration requires careful planning and testing
Automation can deliver immediate and measurable ROI
Understanding user workflows is crucial for successful automation
Full-stack development enables end-to-end solution ownership
